name: Hastur's Scythe (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (tremendous in general).
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hit placement'.
It does psionic damage unbelievably much.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'critical'.
